description: Composite palindromes whose sum of prime factors is palindromic (counted with multiplicity).
links: R. J. Mathar and Giovanni Resta, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000 (first 681 terms from R. J. Mathar)
formula: A046352 INTERSECT A002113. - _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 09 2015
maple: n := 1 ;for i from 3 to 30000 do    pal := A002113(i) ;    if not isprime(pal) then        sof := A001414(pal) ;        if isA002113(sof) then            printf("%d %d\n",n,pal) ;            n := n+1 ;        end if;    end if;end do: # _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 09 2015
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Jun 15 1998.
